Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy for Beauty Awakening by Chantelle

At Beauty Awakening by Chantelle, we are committed to protecting the privacy of our clients. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use our website and booking services.

1. Information We Collect

We collect information about you when you:

Visit our website: We may collect technical information, such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system, to help us improve our website and your browsing experience.   
Make a booking: All booking information is handled through our third-party booking provider, Fresha. This includes your name, contact details, appointment details, and any notes you provide about your treatment preferences. Please refer to Fresha's own privacy policy for details on how they handle your data. You can find their privacy policy on their website.
Contact us: If you contact us via email or phone, we will collect your name and contact details to respond to your enquiry.

2. How We Use Your Information

We use your information to:

Provide and improve our services: This includes managing your bookings, contacting you with appointment reminders, and seeking feedback to enhance our offerings.
Communicate with you: We may send you emails or messages about your appointments, special offers, or updates from Beauty Awakening by Chantelle. You can opt out of marketing communications at any time by contacting us or using the unsubscribe link in our emails.
Comply with legal obligations: We may process your data to fulfil legal requirements.
3. Sharing Your Information

We may share your information with:

Fresha: As mentioned, Fresha handles all our booking data. They are a data processor acting on our behalf, and they are also subject to data protection laws.
Other service providers: We may share information with other service providers who assist us with our business operations, such as payment processors or marketing platforms. We only share information necessary for them to perform their services, and we have contracts in place to ensure they protect your data.
Legal authorities: We may disclose your information if required by law or legal process.

4. Data Security

We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorised access, use, or disclosure.  However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is completely secure.   

5. Your Rights

You have the right to:

Access your data: You can request a copy of the personal information we hold about you.
Rectify inaccuracies: You can ask us to correct any inaccurate or incomplete information we hold about you.
Erase your data: You can ask us to delete your personal information in certain circumstances.
Restrict processing: You can object to the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.
To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the details below.   

6.  Third-Party Links

Our website may contain links to third-party websites.  We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these websites. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any third-party websites you visit.   

7.  Changes to this Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will post any changes on our website.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at:

Beauty Awakening by Chantelle

[Your Contact Details]

Important Notes:

This is a template, and you should adapt it to your specific circumstances.
Consider seeking legal advice to ensure your privacy policy complies with all applicable laws and regulations, especially the UK GDPR and Data Protection Act 2018.
Clearly display this privacy policy on your website, making it easily accessible to your clients.
